oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An exact ground plan of Fort Edward at Pesaquid taken from a survey and laid down by a scale of 60 feet to one inch.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wight, Edward.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Manuscript maps.; Maps shelf.; Brun Guide.; Views, architectural (Fort Edward, N.S.); Fort Edward (N.S.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Nova Scotia--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Very exact ground plan of fort and outlying buildings with the purpose of each identified.; Mr. Deschamps house shown in elevation.; Pasted to this are: [Map of the British landings at Louisbourg] -- Gabarus Bay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: William L. Clements Library Image Bank
